title.value: Применение препарата 'Биокаротивит' с целью стимуляции роста и развития физиологически незрелых поросят
Application of preparation 'Biocarotivit' for growth and development stimulation of physiologically immature pigs
Application of preparation 'Biocarotivit' for growth and development stimulation of physiologically immature pigs

journal.title: Agriculture - Problems and Prospects : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Skudnaya, T.M., Grodno State Agrarian Univ. (Belarus)

abstract.value: Conducting of intensive swine breeding provides carrying out of actions on preventive maintenance of technological stresses. Special value has effective nursery of pigs after weaning. The scheme of 'Biocarotivit' application in pigs-gypotrophycs postnatal period with the purpose of morphogenesis regulation and nutrients absorption and for decrease in consequences of weaning stress is developed in the conditions of the Republic of Belarus. For carrying out of experiences by a principle of groups-analogues three groups of animals (pigs-hypotrophycs, experience; pigs-hypotrophycs, the control and pigs-normotrophycs) have been generated in view of an origin, age, physiological condition, alive weight and preliminary maintenance conditions. The age of pigs made from 20 days till 2,5 months. Under influence of preparation 'Biocarotivit' safety of pigs in skilled group has made 95%, in control - 80%.
